snippet.title: DarkStar One - Nintendo Switch™️ Edition Announcement Trailer (US)
snippet.description:
DarkStar One - Nintendo Switch™️ Edition will conquer the galaxy on 20th June 2024. 

Commander, welcome aboard the DarkStar One – Nintendo Switch™️ Edition! Breach the final frontier and explore the vast expanse of this retro space opera. Jump into the shoes of young Kayron, an aspiring pilot whose heart and mind are filled with thoughts of vengeance for his father’s death. It is up to you to uncover a web of betrayal and ancient threats, gather a trustworthy crew to confront the ultimate menace of darkness, and return hope to a universe on the brink of intergalactic war. 

Yet you have a powerful weapon at your disposal: The long-range fighter, the ‘DarkStar One’, your father’s legacy. Put alien weapons and technology to good use and customize your spacecraft to be prepared to venture out into a myriad of alien worlds to trade cargo and services.
Uncover the secret of your own past and get ready for the final battle now!

*** 

Specializing in the development of strategy and simulation games for a global audience on multi platforms, Kalypso Media Group's IP portfolio includes full rights to the Tropico series, Commandos, Port Royale, Dungeons, Sudden Strike and Railway Empire, among others. Kalypso Media's most recent releases are Matchpoint – Tennis Championships, Commandos 3 – HD Remaster, Tortuga - A Pirate's Tale, and Railway Empire 2, Dungeons 4 and The Inquisitor.

*** 

Subscribe to our newsletter and receive a 20% discount off your next Kalypso store purchase: https://www.kalypsomedia.com/us/newsletter 

*** 

Want to see more? Stay in touch on our other channels: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KalypsoMedia
Twitter: https://twitter.com/kalypsomedia 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kalypso_media/ 

#DarkStarOne #scifiadventure #gaming
